input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='King Ice 8mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry'
  - Name='JAXXON 4mm Rope Chain'
  - Name='GLD South Beach Cuban Necklace in 18K Gold'
  - Name='JAXXON Franco Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 4mm Gold Tennis Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Figaro Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Tennis Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Figaro Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Tennis Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 2mm Round Box'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 4mm Youth Figaro'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Chain, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 8mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same 8mm thickness and Cuban link chain type; very similar product category and style, differing brand and possible slight stylistic variations.
Same brand and chain style category but different link type (rope) and thinner gauge (4mm), making it less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: GLD South Beach Cuban Necklace in 18K Gold
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Cuban link chain style and gold material, but no specified thickness; likely comparable product.
Same brand and chain product type but completely different link style (Franco) and silver material instead of gold Cuban link.
Same brand, same link style, and same gold material but smaller thickness (5mm vs 8mm), somewhat less substantial.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes watch plus Cuban link chain; not a pure chain product, reducing relevancy.
Same brand and gold material but different chain style (tennis) and thinner gauge (4mm).
Same brand and Cuban link style but smaller gauge (3mm) and silver material rather than gold.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Cuban link style, and similar product type but smaller gauge, iced out style, and silver material.
Different link style (Figaro), smaller gauge (3mm) and gold material, less similar in silhouette and design.
Same brand and Cuban link style; smaller gauge (5mm), but similar core design and function.
Tennis set indicates a different jewelry type, not a Cuban link chain, highly irrelevant.
Different link style (Figaro) and likely different construction, thereby lowering relevancy.
Tennis chain is a different chain style and likely thinner, decreasing relevancy.
Different link style (box) and very thin gauge (2mm), not comparable to 8mm Cuban link.
Same brand, style, and gold material but smaller thickness (3mm) reduces similarity.
Different link style (Figaro), smaller size for youth, significantly different from 8mm Cuban link.
Includes Cuban link style and gold material with slightly smaller gauge, making it relevant but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Chain, 20"
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link type but smaller gauge and icing detail differentiate it from the plain 8mm gold chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link with gold material but a bracelet instead of a chain necklace and includes iced out detail.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to the reference but smaller gauge, iced out style, and set format reduces relevancy slightly.
Same style and brand with slightly smaller gauge; being a set adds some difference but overall similar product type.
Smaller gauge, set format, but same brand, style, and gold material means it's moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Larger gauge, silver material, iced out style, and being a set reduce similarity, but still related product type.
Same brand and Cuban link style, but smaller gauge and silver material reduce comparability.
